Instructions.tooltip_game_instructions: Classic memory game where you match two identical images to earn points and progress to the next level.
Instructions.tooltip_game_progress: Initially, there are 3 types of fruits. As you progress, 2 more types are added with each level.
Instructions.tooltip_game_save: After the time has passed, you can save the score with a name.
scoring_conditions: If you match all the cards with the exact number of moves, you'll earn double the number of cards plus a level bonus.
If you complete the game with fewer than 5 extra moves, you'll get the number of cards plus a level bonus.
If you finish the game with between 5 and 10 extra moves, you'll earn half the number of cards plus a level bonus.
If you complete the game with more than 10 extra moves, you'll receive one-third of the number of cards, rounded, plus a level bonus.
